name: Number Tiles Puzzle
description:
“Number Tiles” is an addictive relaxing shoot and merge block game. Come to play Number Tiles and give your brain a rest!

How to play?
⁃ Tap screen to shoot the number blocks.
⁃ The same number blocks will be merged to a bigger number.
⁃ NO TIME LIMIT!

Features:
⁃ Challenging to break your highest score.
⁃ Please collect 2048 and larger numbers.
⁃ Easy to play.
⁃ Multiple beautiful background pictures.
⁃ Multiple materials of blocks. Such as:wood, iron, jewel, brick…
⁃ Classic merge games and block games.
⁃ Very Relaxing! No Time Limit!


Come and play Number Tiles now! Have fun with casual games!
